title: 111_hr5857
content: Fair American Corporate Tax Act or FACT Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) decrease from 35 to 28 the top marginal income tax rate for corporations. And (2) provide that the amount of any tax withholding for deductible payments made by a US subsidiary of a foreign parent corporation to a related subsidiary in any country that has a tax treaty with the United States shall not be less than the amount which would be imposed if the payment were made directly to the foreign parent corporation.
